lead_paragraph: The former Mets manager Bobby Valentine said that the Chiba Lotte Marines decided not to offer him a contract extension after his deal expires in 2009. Valentine, 58, guided the Marines to their first Japan Series title in 31 years in 2005. The team came in fourth this season.
